name: azure-flute
short_effect: Allows entry into the Hall of Origin. Unreleased.

flavor_text.black_white: A flute that puts out echoing sounds that do not seem to be of this world. It is unknown who made it.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A flute that puts out echoing sounds that do not seem to be of this world. It is unknown who made it.
